block.name: Selector
block.doc: Acts as a multiplexer or demultiplexer for multiple signal paths. Connect the sink at input index to the source at output index. Leave all other ports disconnected.

param.name: Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Input and output streams are complex.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Input and output streams are real.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Input and output streams are 32-bit integer.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Input and output streams are 16-bit integer.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Input and output streams are 8-bit byte.

param.name: Num Inputs
param.doc: Specifies the number of inputs. Inputs will be labelled in0 through in(N-1).

param.name: Num Outputs
param.doc: Specifies the number of outputs. Outputs will be labelled out0 through out(N-1).

param.name: Input Index
param.doc: Specifies the selected input. The value must be between 0 and (Num Inputs - 1).

param.name: Output Index
param.doc: Specifies the selected output. The value must be between 0 and (Num Outputs - 1).

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
